name: Bobo Bounco
description:
Join the clown Bobo Bounco on an adventure through colorful worlds to save his circus from a mad magician! #MakeClownsCuteAgain

Bobo Bounco is the world's greatest clown! This is a playful 3D platformer made in Unity as part of a student assignment. You get to go on a journey with Bobo and learn to master the use of his infamous Squirting Blossom and Balloon Glide abilities!

Lead Designer: Ingrid Wæraas

Lead Programmer: Carl William Holm

Marketing Team: Julie Hansen & Kevin Nyen Rundberg

Clown assets made by JBGarraza: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/toon-clown-89310

Environmental assets made by CH Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/lowpoly-style-mega-pack-91978
